fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: - Select a player and up to 7 negative effects that **do not** involve you directly killing your target in anyway (dousing is fine, poison is not). Your target will suffer all of those negative effects for this night and the following day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - __**Part of the Daily Streak faction.**__ If this is the case, you are limited to two negative effects per use.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Live to see the Town lose.
